mapper.insert: insert into documentaryDetailedData (login, varietyCode, cmd, counts, openPrice, openTime, closePrice, closeTime, poundage, status, leftoverCounts, alreadyProfit) values (#{login}, #{varietyCode}, #{cmd}, #{counts}, #{openPrice}, #{openTime}, #{closePrice}, #{closeTime}, #{poundage}, #{status}, #{leftoverCounts}, #{alreadyProfit})
mapper.update: update documentaryDetailedData set login = #{login}, varietyCode = #{varietyCode}, cmd = #{cmd}, counts = #{counts}, openPrice = #{openPrice}, openTime = #{openTime}, closePrice = #{closePrice}, closeTime = #{closeTime}, poundage = #{poundage}, status = #{status}, leftoverCounts = #{leftoverCounts}, alreadyProfit = #{alreadyProfit} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, login, varietyCode, cmd, counts, openPrice, openTime, closePrice, closeTime, poundage, status, leftoverCounts, alreadyProfit FROM documentaryDetailedData

select id, login, varietyCode, cmd, counts, openPrice, openTime, closePrice, closeTime, poundage, status, leftoverCounts, alreadyProfit,newOpenOrderNum from DocumentaryDetailedData where closeTime is null order by openTime asc
